    • tell

      public <PayloadT extends java.io.Serializable> java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<Try<DeliveryStatus>> tell​(ReActorRef src, ReActorRef dst, AckingPolicy ackingPolicy, PayloadT message)
      Sends a message over a remoting channel
      Specified by:
      tell in class ReActorSystemDriver
      Parameters:
      src - source of the message
      dst - destination of the message
      ackingPolicy - Specify if or how we should receive an ACK from the remote reactor system for this message
      message - payload
      Returns:
      A completablefuture that is going to be completed with the outcome of the operation once the message has been delivered into the target's mailbox and has been ACK-ed accordingly with the specified policy
